Reviews.Title: Doesnt do everything But good
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: Okay quality, works right out of the box, and its pretty fast. The only compaint is the the power and headphone jack is very tight and it would suck to break it. So be careful. Other than that its definatly a bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Misty likes :)
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much! My daughter & I both have the android tablet now, after going through several Coby's, this seems to be the one we love!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: jeanice pankonien
Reviews.Content: I order all three of my kids tablets for Christmas and paid extra to get them here on time  (had to wait for pay day) only to have this one not work! Its the 21st of December and one of my kids is going to be disappointed. They were all different makes and sellers! I do not recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: ruby orozco
Reviews.Content: this product broke down right away. I would not recommend this product is you are wanting it for your child.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend this tablet
Reviews.Author: Trudy Skidmore
Reviews.Content: Inferior or defective product. Would not load virtual keyboard to give access to WiFi network. Capacitive touchscreendoes not work.  Can NOT recommend this product.
